title: Modification of polyurethane foams with zinc sulfide nanoparticles and their novel composites with multani mitti and charcoal for oil spill cleanup
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25393-25408
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03924F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shumaila Saleem, Sadia Khalid, Aalia Nazir, Yaqoob Khan, Majid Ali
Modification of PU foam with ZnS based nanocomposites was achieved via simple, scalable and economical coprecipitation route. These modified PU foam exhibited high sorption capacity and mechanical stability which have promising potential for oil spill removal from the environment.
